com.gerken.gumbo.monitor.server

Class MetricsHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gerken.gumbo.monitor.server.MetricsHistory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMetricsHistory

    public class MetricsHistory
extends Object
implements IMetricsHistory
    Maintains and answers the metrics history for a distributed application such as an Apache Storm topology. Application code is instrumented with calls to clients of the MetricsHistory that declare and incrment metrics. The time that a metric is incremented is used to determine the time bucket whose value for that metric will be incremented. Other clients, such as the Gumbo dashboard, make requests for historic metric information that is returned by the MetricsHistory as a Json Object The MetricsHistory can be deployed as part of a monolithic simple monitor that runs in the same JVM as the instrumented application or it can be deployed on a remote node. As a result, the instrumented code talks to one of several clients (local, http or kafka) that, in turn, communicated directly or remotely with the MetricsHistory. As a result, each of the clients and the MetricsHistory itself implement the IMetricsHistory interface.
    Author:
    chrisgerken
